Love Per Square Foot

Ano: 2018

IMDb ID: tt7853242

Classificação: 7.1

Sinopse: Love Per Sq Ft, is a feature film which deals with the very common predicaments that faces today's urban youth; finding a house and finding love. Through the course of this romantic comedy we see Sanjay Chaturvedi and Karina D'souza desperately seeking a house, but realizing the difference between 'ghar' and 'makaan'.
